plot: The Vulka tells the story of Ramon, youngster whose family traditions seem to keep him away from making his dreams come true until the unexpected happens and his fate turns around.
title: La vulka
plot_es: The Vulka tells the story of Ramon, youngster whose family traditions seem to keep him away from making his dreams come true until the unexpected happens and his fate turns around.
plot_en: The Vulka tells the story of Ramon, youngster whose family traditions seem to keep him away from making his dreams come true until the unexpected happens and his fate turns around.
